I started to make marks for myself.
Do you want to leave instructions for the next ones?
I again thought about the dreams and our immortality. I think that we're not flawless geniuses, so before we solve the puzzle, we must undergo numerous attempts and of course die a number of times.
Like that the dreams can be a reality?
